welcome_message_body: Welcome to Goma, a charming city known for its stunning views of Lake Kivu and the vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Goma has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Ble' d' or
restaurants.description: Ble' d' or is a comfort food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Thai Jazz
restaurants.description: Thai Jazz is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Boulangerie au bon pain
restaurants.description: Boulangerie au bon pain is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Calafia Cafe
restaurants.description: Calafia Cafe is a café located in Gisenyi.
restaurants.address: Plot 1600, Avenue de la Revolution, Gisenyi

restaurants.name: Mediteraneo
restaurants.description: Mediteraneo is a italian restaurant located in Goma.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goma Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Goma Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gisenyi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gisenyi Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
